column3: I have come to like blues and jazz music over the years more than classic or rock and roll. Do not even get me started on country western! In any case, If you are anywhere in LA and want to have a great time listening to live blues music, you cannot go wrong visiting this club on weekends. Look at their website for upcoming bands, but their in house band is so great that my wife and I really do not care who the headliner is for that night.
Great shows---top blues acts and great House Band at 8pm . Great food and drinks, low admission price. Open mostly on weekends.

column2: Cool blues, cool drinks and cool people, even the reverend
column3: An unforgettable evening some years ago while having a business trip to TJI met some very friendly people there, e g the reverend who made me visit a church after 39 years...
